tool_description:
DocToText - A data extraction tool well-suited for small and large-scale data extraction projects. 
This software converts a large variety of formats to plain text and HTML. 
DocToText comes with high-grade, scriptable, and trainable OCR and email parsing capabilities.

Formats include:

DOC, XLS, XLSB, PPT, RTF, ODF (ODT, ODS, ODP),
OOXML (DOCX, XLSX, PPTX), iWork (PAGES, NUMBERS, KEYNOTE),
ODFXML (FODP, FODS, FODT), PDF, EML, HTML, Outlook (PST, OST),
Image (JPG, JPEG, JFIF, BMP, PNM, PNG, ...
name: DocWire DocToText
title: DocWire DocToText

api_list.name: extract_text
